title: Life lessons from League
body:
Life lessons from League

1. Life is a team game, play as one and you'll get a win.

2. Smurfs are real in life too, there is guy in the office that knows everything that can do it all, but he is not management = Smurf, be nice to them and they can carry you to sucess

3. Some people need help, they don't know how why help them show them encourage them

4. Dont flame people for trying something different; it may not be what you are used to but when the karthus jungle gets a penta you dont want to be the one who raged

5. Ragers exist in RL, try to help them,  but don't engage with them and dont get invloved, and invariably leave them behind in Wood Teir.


Anymore? Comment
